CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: INV explains Warm-up Activity to FAT then leaves
FAT stands CHI in the middle of the room amidst toys . <aft> FAT rolls up his sleeves as he stands over CHI observing him
CHI bends down and reaches for the football
<aft> CHI drops football to the ground
CHI picks up rubber duck from the floor and begins to squeeze it
FAT squats down in the corner of the room and watches CHI
camera makes noise as it moves
<aft> FAT walks over to chair and sits down
CHI plays with the duck then picks up the football . <aft> CHI puts down football then picks up car
CHI stands up . <aft> CHI turns around facing FAT then looks around the room
CHI looks down at car in his hand then looks up at FAT
FAT reaches for car in CHI hand
FAT quickly glances up at camera while reaching for the car
FAT grabs car from CHI . <aft> FAT rolls the car across the rug
CHI turns and looks down as the car rolls past him on the rug on the floor
<aft> CHI picks up rubber duck and starts to squeeze it
CHI walks over to FAT then hands the rubber duck to FAT
FAT takes rubber duck and squeezes it repeatedly to make squeaking noises then hands it back to CHI
CHI takes rubber duck from FAT then turns his back to FAT and walks away . CHI looks down
FAT gets up and walks over to jack+in+the+box on the floor
FAT bends down and reaches for the jack+in+the+box
<aft> FAT begins to turn jack+in+the+box handle
CHI stands next to FAT and watches FAT
FAT turns and looks up at CHI then moves back away from jack+in+the+box and CHI
CHI bends down then reaches for jack+in+the+box
CHI drops rubber duck to the floor then attempts to push clown back into jack+in+the+box
FAT pushes clown back into jack+in+the+box and closes lid
CHI reaches down and touches the handle of the jack+in+the+box
<aft> CHI lifts jack+in+the+box off the floor then puts it back down on the floor . CHI picks up the duck
FAT walks over to chair and sits down
CHI stands up and turns to look at door
CHI looks at door in response to noise outside
CHI looks down at duck in his hand
FAT watches CHI then looks around room
CHI drops rubber duck to the floor and picks up football
CHI looks around the floor while holding the football
FAT walks over to book lying on the floor in front of CHI
<aft> FAT bends down turning the pages of the book
CHI turns around and looks down
<aft> FAT walks back to chair and sits down
CHI walks over to FAT and hands football to him
FAT pretends to start to throw ball to CHI but does not follow through and instead hands football to CHI
CHI stares at football in his hands
CHI turns from facing FAT then looks around the room
FAT points to football in CHI's hands
CHI drops football to the floor and picks up rubber duck
<aft> CHI walks across the room towards the desk looking up
FAT points to chair against wall while looking at CHI
CHI is staring at rubber duck in his hands
<aft> FAT taps CHI arm to get attention
CHI turns around then looks across the room . <aft> CHI walks across the room then bends down reaching for something
<aft> CHI rolls car back and forth on the rug
CHI stands up then begins to walk about the room looking down at the duck in his hands
rubber duck slips out of CHI's hand and onto the floor
FAT gets up out of chair then reaches for the toy
FAT picks up rubber duck and places it on the chair against the opposite wall
<aft> FAT sits back into his chair
<aft> CHI takes rubber duck lying on chair seat into his and stands there squeezing it
CHI turns around and looks at FAT
<aft> CHI looks up then points to something on the wall out of camera view
CHI is squeezing rubber duck in his hands
CHI is looking up while walking towards wall
CHI looks up at FAT then at the rubber duck in his hands
CHI is squeezing rubber duck in his hands
rubber duck slips out of CHI's hands and falls to the floor
CHI picks up rubber duck and squeezes it
CHI looks briefly at rubber duck in his hand
<aft> CHI throws rubber duck on the floor and picks up jack+in+the+box
CHI walks over to FAT with jack+in+the+box in his hands
FAT grabs jack+in+the+box out of CHI's hands
CHI looks at jack+in+the+box while FAT turns handle then glances over at FAT briefly
FAT goes to turn handle but his hands slips
FAT turns handle a bit more
CHI stares at jack+in+the+box in FAT's hands
FAT looks at CHI while holding jack+in+the+box out in front of him
FAT turns the handle a few more turns
CHI reaches out and clasps his hands around the clown
<$=3> FAT helps CHI push clown back into jack+in+the+box
FAT helps CHI close the lid
FAT sets jack+in+the+box on the floor in front of CHI
<aft> FAT leans back in his chair and observes CHI
CHI leans over jack+in+the+box and tries to turn handle
FAT leans down and picks up jack+in+the+box then holds it in front of CHI
FAT has his hand over CHI's as he helps CHI turn handle
CHI is staring at jack+in+the+box as he turns handle
FAT and CHI's hand slip off of handle
FAT turns the handle a few more times until end of tune is heard
<aft> CHI tries to push clown back into jack+in+the+box
FAT helps CHI by putting his hand over CHI's and pushing down
FAT flips lid down with his finger
CHI pushes lid to hold it down
FAT pushes clown back down and closes lid
FAT puts his hand over CHI's and pushes down
FAT sets jack+in+the+box down on floor in front of CHI
CHI briefly attempts to turn handle
CHI brings jack+in+the+box over to FAT who is sitting in chair and hands it to him
FAT holds jack+in+the+box in front of CHI
FAT takes CHI's hand and places it on handle
FAT turns his hand in a clockwise motion
FAT puts his hand over CHI's and helps CHI turn handle
CHI pulls his hand back and steps slightly away from jack+in+the+box
CHI looks at jack+in+the+box while FAT turns handle
<aft> FAT puts jack+in+the+box on the floor
Small Scale Activity occurs between 15:11:35 and 15:20:00
INV explains Forbidden Object Activity to FAT then places Forbidden Object on table in front of CHI
CHI stares at Forbidden Object and reaches out to touch it
FAT lays his hand on CHI's arm
CHI reaches out to touch Forbidden Object
FAT puts his finger on CHI's hand and pushes CHI's hand downward
CHI stares at Forbidden Object and reaches out to touch it
CHI reaches for and holds on to one of the balls on the object
FAT reaches for CHI's arm moving it down
CHI is staring at Forbidden Object and reaches out to touch it
FAT reaches for CHI's arm from behind and pushes it down
FAT is leaning over CHI and watching him closely
CHI looks down at Slinkie toy in his hand
CHI begins to expand and compress Slinkie
FAT momentarily looks up at INV
INV holds object in her hand while explaining PCI boxes
CHI looks up and points toward object in INV's hand . <aft> CHI looks down at the toy in his hands
CHI is looking something on desk
FAT squats down then holds out ball to CHI
CHI stands with ball in his hand
FAT sits down crosslegged on the floor across from CHI and motions to CHI to throw ball to him
FAT claps his hands then spreads them out to catch ball
<aft> CHI puts ball in FAT's hands
FAT takes ball from CHI and throws it against adjacent wall
CHI watches ball and turns around to follow it as it rolls behind him
CHI turns around then reaches down for the ball
FAT holds his hands out wide in order to catch ball and waits for CHI to throw it
FAT leans forward and grabs ball out of CHI's hands
<bef> FAT smacks ball in his hands
FAT holds ball out to CHI
CHI begins to walk toward FAT
FAT throws ball straight up in the air then catches it and hands it to CHI
CHI holds ball out slightly toward FAT
FAT points to adjacent wall and then looks back at CHI
FAT reaches out to grab ball
CHI walks toward sassy seat against wall
FAT pulls sassy seat into corner of room away from CHI
FAT takes ball out of CHI's hands
<aft> FAT throws ball against adjacent wall
CHI picks up ball after it bounces against the wall and puts it in the sassy seat in the corner of the room
FAT watches CHI then comes to his knees and takes ball out of sassy seat
<aft> FAT spins ball on the floor
<aft> CHI picks up ball and then bounces it
<aft> FAT holds ball out in front of CHI
FAT points to spot in front of CHI where he intends to throw the ball
ball hits CHI in the face
FAT picks up ball and holds it out to CHI
CHI couples ball in his arms
FAT shakes his head in a negative fashion while smiling
CHI begins to walk slowly toward FAT
FAT reaches over and strokes CHI head
CHI walks over to table and looks underneath
FAT stands up and reaches for empty box on desk
FAT holds empty box out in front of CHI
FAT moves box closer to CHI
CHI drops ball into the box
FAT stands up and puts box with ball on desktop and picks up new box
CHI watches FAT and reaches up for box which FAT is bringing down
FAT kneels down on one knee and lays box on floor
<bef> FAT looks up at approaching CHI
FAT opens box and takes towel out
<aft> FAT throws towel over CHI's head
FAT sits down on the floor
CHI starts to pull towel down off of his head
FAT grabs end of towel and pulls it off of CHI's head
FAT grabs towel out of CHI's hands
CHI holds on to towel until FAT lets go and then drops it to the floor
grunting and mimicking CHI's whining sound then chuckles
FAT picks up towel from the floor
FAT holds up towel in front of his face
FAT holds up towel in front of his face
CHI walks to FAT and grabs the ends of the towel
FAT quickly pulls towel down to expose his face
CHI restless walks away from FAT
FAT throws towel toward CHI and it lands on the floor
FAT picks up towel and throws it on CHI's head
CHI pulls towel down off his head and throws it on the floor
FAT comes to his knees and is smiling as he looks down at CHI
FAT picks up towel and begins to fold it
FAT turns to look in CHI's direction
FAT stands up and puts folded towel back into box on the desk
FAT lays box on the floor
CHI stares at box as he slowly walks toward it
FAT takes some paper out of the box and spreads it on the floor
FAT holds up one crayon in each of his hands in front of CHI
CHI takes both crayons in his hands
FAT picks up red crayon from out of the box
FAT draws on paper with red crayon
CHI watches FAT draw on paper
FAT looks up at CHI and points to drawing
CHI starts to walk slowly toward drawing lying on the floor beside FAT
FAT walks behind CHI and sits crosslegged behind him
FAT picks up CHI underneath his arms and sits him down between himself and the paper on the floor
CHI starts to draw on paper
FAT grabs box cover and turns it upside down then puts paper on top of it and holds it in front of CHI
CHI makes strokes on the paper lying on the box cover and then lays it aside and proceeds to do the same on next exposed sheet
<aft> CHI leans over to sheets now lying beside him and begins to draw more on these
FAT takes box cover and lays it aside then picks up crayon next to CHI and drops it on the paper on which he is drawing
FAT is kneeling beside CHI watching him draw
FAT turns the crayon rightside up and then cups his hand over CHI's and guides it as they draw together on the paper
CHI turns away from paper and looks restlessly around the room
FAT pushes paper in front of CHI
FAT couples his hand over CHI's and they draw together then FAT lets go of CHI's hand and CHI continues to draw by himself
CHI stops drawing and looks up at FAT
FAT picks up red crayon from the floor and hands it to CHI
FAT seems to be referring to a previous injury to CHI hand
FAT reaches for CHI hand and looks at it briefly
FAT grabs CHI's right hand and tries to pull crayon CHI is holding out of his hand
CHI holds on to crayon tightly and pulls away
FAT drops red crayon to the paper
FAT draws with the red crayon on the paper
CHI begins to draw on the paper
<aft> CHI stops and looks up and around the room
FAT pulls box cover next to CHI
CHI pulls paper off of box cover and starts to draw on it but then turns his attention to other papers lying on the floor
CHI turns around on the floor then sits on the box cover
FAT pulls box cover out from under CHI and lays it aside
CHI watches FAT move the box away . <aft> CHI stands up then walks away from FAT
<aft> CHI goes to draw on sassy seat
FAT leans over on his knees to CHI
FAT goes to pull crayon out of CHI's hand
CHI drops crayon out of his hand
FAT gathers paper up off of the floor
CHI begins to walk slowly to FAT
CHI squats down next to box and looks inside
FAT picks up paper and crayons from the floor and drops them into the box
CHI picks up crayon from the box and draws a few strokes on the paper lying in the box
FAT picks crayon out of CHI's hands and drops it into the box
FAT picks crayon out of CHI's other hand and drops it into the box
CHI squats down beside box and goes to grab box
<aft> FAT lays box on desktop and picks up Box number 4
FAT takes box down from the desktop and lays it on the floor between himself and CHI
<aft> FAT sits down on the floor
FAT points to writing on box
CHI looks down at box and then squats down beside it
FAT slowly lifts up box cover
CHI slowly stands up as FAT is lifting box cover up . CHI looks down
FAT looks at book in box
FAT lays box cover on chair beside him
FAT is struggling to find something in his pockets
CHI picks up book out of the box
<bef> FAT takes now empty box and lays it on top of box cover on chair
FAT leans over to CHI and grabs him by the shoulder
<aft> FAT wipes CHI's nose with a tissue he has pulled from his pants pocket
FAT sets CHI on his lap
FAT takes book from CHI's hands and turns it rightside up
FAT points to picture in book
CHI begins to make sound similar to woof woof@o and proceeds to repeat it throughout the remainder of the interaction
FAT imitating sound CHI is making
FAT leans over and looks into CHI's face
FAT imitating sound CHI is making
FAT leans and looks into CHI's face
FAT imitating sound CHI is making
FAT goes to grabs CHI's arm
CHI starts to climb out of FAT lap
FAT grabs CHI's arm and guides him to turn page
CHI leans back into FAT's lap
FAT leans over CHI and looks into his face
FAT points to picture on opposite page
FAT leans over CHI and looks into his face
CHI is staring at book while FAT is reading
FAT turns pages back to get to front cover but stops at one of the pages
FAT leans over and looks at CHI
FAT gently taps CHI on the shoulder
FAT lays open book down on floor
FAT takes CHI off of his lap and tries to set him on floor next to book
CHI locks his legs so FAT cannot sit him down
FAT bends CHI's knee and sets him down on the floor
FAT puts book in the CHI's hands
FAT scoots over to corner of the room and leans on the door and from this position observes CHI
CHI flips through pages and looks at pictures
<$=3> FAT watches CHI from across the room
FAT circles his hand in an encouraging motion
FAT leans over and points to picture
CHI turns again and looks at FAT
CHI is looking at the book
approaching footsteps are heard outside the door
<bef> CHI looks down at the book . CHI looks at door
